name: The Cyclists Cyclical Circuit
description:
Daniel is a standard bicyclist and he has been biking for a while. today he is taking part in the centennial cyclist cycle competition a cyclic competition held once every 100 years. In it competitors all race on circular tracks and see how long they can go without falling off as the refs create obstacles in the path. How long will Daniel go for? that's up to you to find out!

all of the art, sound effects, and code were created by me but the music was from free sound.org
music - https://freesound.org/people/BloodPixelHero/sounds/580898/

W - forward
A - inward
D - outward
